title: How to view Summoner XP Earned in new beta client
body:
Is it just me, or is there no way to view Summoner XP Earned for played matches in the new beta client? It shows IP earned and the in-game Champion XP earned, but nothing about Summoner XP. In order to view this, I have to go into the Legacy Client and view the match history from there.

What's the new acceptable way to get Summoner XP Earned stats?

**UPDATE:** I have created this follow-up post in the "Client Discussion" board: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion/a6j9vAE9-no-way-to-view-summoner-xp-earned

replies.body: The updated client is still in testing, so some features or info may not be available yet.  You can continue using the legacy for now, and feel free to share any feedback on this through the [client discussion](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) boards.  Let me know if that clears things up!

I guess so...although I am still seeking a more satisfactory answer in general.

I've created this post in response: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion/a6j9vAE9-no-way-to-view-summoner-xp-earned
